means: 因陀罗（印度神话中印度教的主神，司雷雨及战争）
（古）（印度教）因陀罗（主神，司雷雨）

sentence.Network_en: Indra's most notable exploit was his battle with Vritra.
sentence.Network_cn: 因陀罗最显赫的功勋是他和维他的战斗.

sentence.Network_en: No sorrow, suffering, or fear were allowed in Indra's home.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他的家园里,永远都没有悲伤 、 痛苦和恐惧.

sentence.Network_en: In Vedic times, Indra was the supreme ruler of the gods.
sentence.Network_cn: 在吠陀时代, 因陀罗是众神的统治者.
